content: crochet your very own gorgeous chunky trivets in a lovely design with bubbles 1 you make them using hobbii snowstorm 2 which is a 100% wool non-superwash yarn perfect for machine felting enjoy be aware that these trivets are not suitable for burningly hot pots and pans they are very suitable for warm serving trays bowls and tea pots **materials ** - crochet hook l 8mm - hobbii snowstorm **measurements ** approx 7- 8 see the section about felting in the pattern **yarn requirements ** approx 65g **abbreviations ** **chain** chain **st** stitch **single_crochet** single_crochet **slip_stitch** slip_stitch **double_crochet** double_crochet **bust** bubble stitch 1 https //hobbii com/felted-trivet-bubbles utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=felted-trivet-bubbles&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii com/snowstorm utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=snowstorm&utm_term=swr
